account.descriptionLink:
This proposal will upgrade our existing program to the latest version release by the Solana team. The new version will allow us to launch the Council, among other new features.

More information can be found here: https://forums.orca.so/t/housekeeping-proposals-ahead-of-council-launch/144
account.name: Upgrade Orca Governance to SPL Governance v3

account.descriptionLink: This proposal is reducing the community veto to 1% and updating the council passing threshold to 51% ahead of the Council launch.
account.name: Update Governance Parameters

account.descriptionLink: This proposal is changing the Council Token from 'Liquid' to 'Membership', allowing community members to revoke a Council token.
account.name: Council Token Update
Governance Council - Re-election 2024 Term

account.descriptionLink: This proposal will update the Council token to Membership instead of Liquid, allowing the community to revoke Council tokens.
account.name: Update Council Toke Type

account.descriptionLink:
Note: the proposal was originally posted on Orca's governance forum. 

The link to the thread can be found here: https://forums.orca.so/t/bug-bounty-program/36.
account.name: Bug Bounty Program

account.descriptionLink: Housekeeping proposal to update the DAO Governance program thresholds.
account.name: DAO Governance Program Thresholds

account.descriptionLink: For details of the proposal, please visit https://forums.orca.so/t/orca-treasury-conversion-proposal/118
account.name: Orca Treasury Conversion Proposal

account.descriptionLink:
This proposal will update the community voting weight source from the current 50% (50,000,000) to 100% of the ORCA supply (100,000,000).

More information can be found here: https://forums.orca.so/t/housekeeping-proposals-ahead-of-council-launch/144
account.name: Update Vote Weight to 100% from 50%

account.descriptionLink:
This is an ORCA tokenholder proposal to authorize:

- Programmatically using ongoing Protocol Fees to fund ORCA buybacks for staking incentives for ORCA holders

- $10M of open market buybacks using existing Protocol Treasury funds

- Burning 25% of total token supply

- Funding initial development team for 2+ yrs

The full proposal can be found here:
https://forums.orca.so/t/tokenholder-proposal-for-xorca-initial-development-team-grant-buybacks-and-burn/882
account.name: Tokenholder Proposal for: xORCA, Initial Development Team Grant, Buybacks, and Burn

account.descriptionLink:
This Council proposal seeks to formally amend the Bylaws of Orca Foundation to reflect the protocol changes adopted by the 14 April 2025 Tokenholder Proposal.

The full proposal can be found here: https://forums.orca.so/t/governance-proposal-first-amendment-to-bylaws/944
account.name: Governance Council Proposal - First Amendment to Bylaws

account.descriptionLink: This is a housekeeping proposal to update Orca's governance program to v3.1.1. More information can be found in this thread: https://forums.orca.so/t/governance-program-upgrade/216.
account.name: Update: Governance Program v3.1.1

account.descriptionLink:
If passed, this proposal will:

1. Authorize the Council to stake any or all the SOL in the ORCA DAO Treasury.

2. Authorize the Council to utilize any or all of the SOL and USDC in the Treasury to purchase ORCA tokens on the open market over the next 24 months.

The full proposal can be found here: https://forums.orca.so/t/orca-governance-proposal-orca-treasury-utilization-for-token-buybacks-and-validator-staking/1058
account.name: Governance Council Proposal: ORCA Treasury Utilization for Token Buybacks and Validator Staking

account.descriptionLink:
Updating the voting parameters to 250,000 proposal threshold, 1% passing threshold, and 3% Veto threshold on Council proposals.

More information can be found here: https://forums.orca.so/t/housekeeping-proposals-ahead-of-council-launch/144
account.name: Update DAO Voting Parameters

account.descriptionLink:
This is a vote to (i) form the Orca Governance Council, and (ii) elect the initial council members. 

An in-depth explanation and discussion on the Orca Governance Council can be found here: https://forums.orca.so/t/governance-council.

An overview of the initial council members can be found here: https://forums.orca.so/t/governance-council-members.
account.name: Orca Governance Council

account.descriptionLink: Updating the council token model to 'Membership' will allow the community to revoke Council membership
account.name: Update Council Token to Membership

account.descriptionLink: Testing the Voter Thresholds.
account.name: Community Proposal Test

account.descriptionLink: This proposal will create a signaling governance account used for all text based proposals.
account.name: Establish Signaling Governance

account.descriptionLink: This is a Council proposal to authorize authorize payment from the Orca protocol fee treasury in the amount of 500,000 USDC tokens to support various risk mitigation initiatives. For the full details of the proposal, voting and tokenholder veto process, refer to the original Forums post available here: https://forums.orca.so/t/council-proposal-dao-funding-for-risk-mitigation-efforts-update/540.
account.name: Governance Council Proposal - DAO Funding for Risk Mitigation Efforts

account.descriptionLink: This is an on-chain governance proposal for the reallocation of protocol trading fees. All the details for this proposal can be found here: https://forums.orca.so/t/tokenholder-proposal-orca-trading-fees-reallocation/245
account.name: Orca Trading Fees Reallocation Proposal

account.descriptionLink: This is a council vote for the Climate Fund Working Group. Details on the working group can be found in this forum thread: https://forums.orca.so/t/governance-council-proposal-climate-fund-working-group-updated/219/
account.name: Climate Fund Working Group

account.descriptionLink:
This is on-chain proposal to (i) ratify a 5M ORCA allocation to the existing team of contributors, and (ii) ratify a 100k USDC bug bounty payout to a whitehat.

All the gory details for this proposal can be found here: https://forums.orca.so/t/governance-council-proposal-contributor-grant-bug-bounty/187.
account.name: Governance Council Proposal: Contributor Grant + Bug Bounty

account.descriptionLink: This is a Council proposal to authorize the conversion of 50% of the SOL in the Orca protocol fee treasury into USDC.  For the full details of the proposal, voting and tokenholder veto process, refer to the original Forums post available here:  https://forums.orca.so/t/council-proposal-treasury-composition-update/539.
account.name: Governance Council Proposal - Treasury Composition

account.descriptionLink: This is a Council proposal to authorize payments from the Orca protocol fee treasury to cover tick array initialization costs.  For details regarding this proposal, please refer to the following Forums post:  https://forums.orca.so/t/council-proposal-dao-payment-of-tick-array-costs/385.
account.name: Governance Proposal - DAO Payment of Tick Array Costs

account.descriptionLink:
If passed, this proposal will:

1. Authorize the Council to stake any or all the SOL in the ORCA DAO Treasury.

2. Authorize the Council to utilize any or all of the SOL and USDC in the Treasury to purchase ORCA tokens on the open market over the next 24 months.

The full proposal can be found here: https://forums.orca.so/t/orca-governance-proposal-orca-treasury-utilization-for-token-buybacks-and-validator-staking/1058
account.name: Governance Council Proposal: ORCA Treasury Utilization for Token Buybacks and Validator Staking

account.descriptionLink: This is an on-chain Council proposal to deposit 300,000 USDC into Orca's USDC-USDT pool.  All the details for this proposal can be found here:  https://forums.orca.so/t/governance-council-proposal-treasury-deposit-to-stablecoin-pool/206
account.name: Governance Council Proposal: Treasury Deposit to Stablecoin Pool

account.descriptionLink: This is a Council proposal to authorize a reallocation of trading fees collected on pools with fee tiers at or above 0.16% to mirror the current allocation of trading fees on pools with fee tiers at or above 0.30%.  For the full details of the proposal, voting and tokenholder veto process, refer to the original Forums post available here:  https://forums.orca.so/t/council-proposal-reduction-of-protocol-fee-threshold/536.
account.name: Governance Council Proposal - Reduction of Protocol Fee Threshold

account.descriptionLink: This is a Council proposal to eliminate the protocol fee threshold by authorizing a reallocation of trading fees collected on all fee tiers to mirror the current allocation of trading fees on pools with fee tiers at or above 0.16%. For the full details of the proposal, voting and tokenholder veto process, refer to the original Forums post available here: https://forums.orca.so/t/council-proposal-elimination-of-protocol-fee-threshold/681
account.name: Governance Council Proposal - Elimination of Protocol Fee Threshold

account.descriptionLink: This proposal will mint a Council token for Chad Miller following their election. https://forums.orca.so/t/orca-governance-council-call-for-council-member-nominations-for-vacant-seats/640
account.name: Add council member - Chad Miller

account.descriptionLink: This is a Council proposal to (i) elect Logan Jastremski to the Orca Governance Council for the 2024 term and (ii) mint a new Council token for Mr. Jastremski. Further information regarding this proposal can be found here: https://forums.orca.so/t/council-proposal-to-elect-new-member/379
account.name: Governance Proposal - Member Election & Council Token Mint

account.descriptionLink:
This proposal does two things: (i) revokes admin token, and (ii) mints seven (7) council tokens, one for each member of the Orca Governance Council. 

All the gory details for this proposal can be found on the forum: https://forums.orca.so/t/governance-council-technical-proposal/178.
account.name: Governance Council Token Mint

account.descriptionLink:
This is a tokenholder proposal to vote on:

1. Update the existing council voting thresholds
2. Adopt governance by-laws

Full proposal: https://forums.orca.so/t/tokenholder-proposal-updating-the-council-program-and-adopting-by-laws/247
account.name: Updating the Council Program and Adopting by-laws

account.descriptionLink:
This proposal updates the following parameters for the Council Token contract as per this forum post (https://forums.orca.so/t/governance-council-technical-proposal/178). 

Community Proposal Threshold Before: 100,000 ORCA
Community Proposal Threshold After: 1,000,000 ORCA

Community Proposal Pass Threshold Before: 1,000,000 ORCA
Community Proposal Pass Threshold After: 2,000,000 ORCA

Council Proposal Threshold Before: 1 Token
Council Proposal Threshold After: None

Voting Time Before: 7 days
Voting Time After: 10 days

Cool-down Period Before: 0 hours
Cool-down Period After: 96 hours
account.name: Governance Council â€” Technical Updates

account.descriptionLink: This is a Council proposal to elect (i) Tim Westcott and (ii) Carl Bergman to the Orca Governance Council for the 2025 term. Further information regarding this proposal and the candidates can be found here: https://forums.orca.so/t/orca-governance-council-call-for-council-member-nominations-for-vacant-seats/
account.name: Governance Council Proposal - Member Election for 2025 Term (Candidates from Initial Self-Nomination Period)

account.descriptionLink:
This is a Council proposal to burn the Council token previously minted for former Council member Min Teo, who elected not to sit for re-election.  This is the first step required in order to then elect a replacement Council member and mint their Council token.
Further information regarding this proposal can be found here: https://forums.orca.so/t/council-proposal-to-elect-new-member/379
account.name: Governance Proposal - Burn Council Token

account.descriptionLink:
This is a Council proposal to re-elect the following individuals to the Orca Governance Council for the 2025 term: (i) Cortina; (ii) Chris Montagano; (iii) Lakshman Sankar; and (iv) Logan Jastremski.

Further information regarding this proposal can be found here:  https://forums.orca.so/t/council-proposal-2025-re-elections/638?u=tags
account.name: Governance Council - Re-election 2025 Term

account.descriptionLink: This proposal is correcting a technical error with a previously approved tokenholder proposal, outlined here: https://forums.orca.so/t/tokenholder-proposal-correcting-technical-error-in-proposal-to-update-council-program/345
account.name: Correction Proposal: Updating the Council Program

account.descriptionLink: Updating the Council Token governance so only community proposals can submit changes using the new voting parameters.
account.name: Update Council Token Parameters

account.descriptionLink: This is a Council proposal to elect (i) Carl Bergman and (ii) Tim Westcott to the Orca Governance Council for the 2025 term. Further information regarding this proposal can be found here: https://forums.orca.so/t/council-proposal-to-elect-new-member/379
account.name: Governance Council Proposal - Election 2025 for Open Seats (Round 1 of Self-Nominations)

account.descriptionLink: This proposal will mint a Council token for Tim Westcott following their election. https://forums.orca.so/t/orca-governance-council-call-for-council-member-nominations-for-vacant-seats/640
account.name: Add council member - Tim Westcott

account.descriptionLink:
The following members have left the council following 2025 re-election: Larry Sukernik, Wes Tang-Wymer, Hart Lambur.

We are revoking their tokens to formally remove their Council membership in the DAO.

https://forums.orca.so/t/council-proposal-2025-re-elections/638
account.name: Revoke Council Tokens (2025 Re-election)

account.descriptionLink: This is a Council proposal to elect Chad Miller to the Orca Governance Council for the 2025 term. Further information regarding this proposal and the candidate can be found here:  https://forums.orca.so/t/orca-governance-council-call-for-council-member-nominations-for-vacant-seats/640/6
account.name: Governance Council Proposal - Member Election for 2025 Term (Candidate from Second Self-Nomination Period)

account.descriptionLink: This proposal will mint a Council token for Carl Bergman (Reverie) following their election. https://forums.orca.so/t/orca-governance-council-call-for-council-member-nominations-for-vacant-seats/640
account.name: Add council member - Carl Bergman (Reverie)
